result.arabic_text: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَمۡلَيۡتُ لَهَا وَهِيَ ظَالِمَةٞ ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُهَا وَإِلَيَّ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
result.translation: 48. Kaadu magaaloolî marak makina mara wadirroyseeh, digaalá wadirih как hee marak usun korosuh anuk, tohuk lakat woo magaaloolih mara ibbixeeh ken digaaleh addunyal, kaadu madaara keenik yoo fanah takkeeh akeeral cakkisitan digaalah ken digaaleyyo iyye Yalli.
